params.sqlcmd: "SELECT " +" UDWR.PLANT_CD, " +" UDWR.DAILY_WORK_REPORT_TYP, " +" UDWR.USER_CD, " +" TO_CHAR(UDWR.OPR_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') OPR_DATE, " +" UDWR.WORK_SHIFT_CODE, " +" UDWR.START_TIME, " +" UDWR.END_TIME, " +" UDWR.OPR_TIME, " +" UDWR.WS_CD, " +" UDWR.OPR_TYP, " +" UDWR.UN_OPR_CAUSE_TYP, " +" UDWR.UN_OPR_TIME, " +" UDWR.DAILY_WORK_REPORT_CTL_NO, " +" UDWR.SEQ_NO, " +" UDWR.MODIFY_COUNT " +"FROM " +" T_DAILY_WORK_REPORT UDWR, " +" M_PLANT MP " +"WHERE " +" UDWR.PLANT_CD = MP.PLANT_CD " +" AND MP.PLANT_CD = ? " +" AND UDWR.DAILY_WORK_REPORT_TYP = TO_NUMBER(?) " +" AND UDWR.PLANT_CD = ? " +" AND TRUNC(UDWR.OPR_DATE) >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +" AND TRUNC(UDWR.OPR_DATE) <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +" AND UDWR.USER_CD = ? " +" AND UDWR.WS_CD = ? " +" AND ROWNUM <= TO_NUMBER(?) + 1 " +"ORDER BY " +" UDWR.PLANT_CD, " +" UDWR.USER_CD, " +" UDWR.OPR_DATE, " +" UDWR.WORK_SHIFT_CODE, " +" UDWR.SEQ_NO, " +" UDWR.START_TIME"
"SELECT " +" USER_NAME, " +" PLANT_CD " +"FROM " +" USER_MST " +"WHERE " +" USER_CD = ? " +" AND PLANT_CD = ?"

"SELECT " +" UDWR.DAILY_WORK_REPORT_CTL_NO, " +" UDWR.SEQ_NO, " +" UDWR.WS_CD, " +" MW.WS_NAME, " +" UDWR.START_TIME, " +" UDWR.END_TIME, " +" UDWR.OPR_TIME, " +" UDWR.OPR_TYP, " +" UDWR.UN_OPR_CAUSE_TYP, " +" UDWR.UN_OPR_TIME, " +" UDWR.REMARKS, " +" UDWR.MODIFY_COUNT " +"FROM " +" T_DAILY_WORK_REPORT UDWR, " +" M_WS MW " +"WHERE " +" UDWR.WS_CD = MW.WS_CD " +" AND UDWR.DAILY_WORK_REPORT_CTL_NO = ? " +"ORDER BY " +" UDWR.SEQ_NO"

"INSERT INTO " +" T_DAILY_WORK_REPORT(DAILY_WORK_REPORT_CTL_NO, SEQ_NO, PLANT_CD, DAILY_WORK_REPORT_TYP, USER_CD, OPR_DATE, WORK_SHIFT_CODE, WS_CD, START_TIME, END_TIME, OPR_TIME, OPR_TYP, UN_OPR_CAUSE_TYP, UN_OPR_TIME, REMARKS) " +"VALUES " +" (?, TO_NUMBER(?), ?, TO_NUMBER(?), ?, TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), ?, ?, ?, ?, TO_NUMBER(?), NVL(TO_NUMBER(?), 0), NVL(TO_NUMBER(?), 0), TO_NUMBER(?), ?)"

"SELECT " +" START_TIME, " +" END_TIME " +"FROM " +" T_DAILY_WORK_REPORT " +"WHERE " +" TRUNC(OPR_DATE) = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +" AND WS_CD = ? " +" AND USER_CD = ? " +" AND DAILY_WORK_REPORT_TYP = ?"
"SELECT " +" SUM(OPR_TIME) " +"FROM " +" T_DAILY_WORK_REPORT " +"WHERE " +" TRUNC(OPR_DATE) = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +" AND USER_CD = ? " +" AND DAILY_WORK_REPORT_TYP = ?"
"SELECT " +" UM.USER_NAME, " +" UM.PLANT_CD " +"FROM " +" USER_MST UM, " +" M_PLANT MP " +"WHERE " +" MP.PLANT_CD = ? " +" AND UM.USER_CD = ? " +" AND UM.PLANT_CD = MP.PLANT_CD"
"SELECT " +" MW.WS_NAME, " +" MW.PLANT_CD " +"FROM " +" M_WS MW, " +" M_PLANT MP " +"WHERE " +" MW.WS_CD = ? " +" AND MW.PLANT_CD = MP.PLANT_CD " +" AND MP.PLANT_CD = ?"

"SELECT " +" MC.HOLIDAY_FLG " +"FROM " +" USER_MST UM, " +" M_CAL MC, " +" M_PLANT MP " +"WHERE " +" UM.PLANT_CD = MP.PLANT_CD " +" AND UM.USER_CD = ? " +" AND MP.CAL_NO = MC.CAL_NO " +" AND TO_DATE(MC.CAL_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD')"
